requests.name: json-response-test
html-response-test
environment-variables-test
requests.preRequestScript:
export {};
hopp.env.set('test_key', 'test_value')
hopp.env.set('recursive_key', '<<test_key>>')
hopp.env.global.set('global_key', 'global_value')
hopp.env.active.set('active_key', 'active_value')

// `pm` namespace equivalents
pm.variables.set('pm_test_key', 'pm_test_value')
pm.environment.set('pm_active_key', 'pm_active_value')
pm.globals.set('pm_global_key', 'pm_global_value')
